column4: Please Can You Help me with my Microfon :$ Im making calls with skype but they can not hear me ?
Please Can You Help me with my Microfon :$ Im making calls with skype but they can not hear me ?
Please Can You Help me with my Microfon :$ Im making calls with skype but they can not hear me ?
Make sure mic is live and is not muted.  Make test calls and change input device settings.
